name: KILLSWITCH (clonethirteen)
description:
Kill the things. Switch to new weapon. Kill more of the things. Switch to new weapon. Got it soldier? Now GO!!!

Controls - WASD to move, mouse left-click to shoot.

This game was made by Amine and clonethirteen for ExtenJam Lite with the theme of "exchange."

Amine did - game design, art, sound fx

clonethirteen  did - programming and music

To make this game we used Construct 3, Tiles, FL Studio, Piskel, and SFXR.
